questions.question: Why is algae and seaweed important?
answers: They are a food source for whales
They produce a majority of the oxygen we breathe
They provide shelter for small fish

questions.question: Why are sharks and predators important to an ecosystem?
answers: They provide food for smaller fish
They make the ocean more dangerous
